Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Researcher toggle in Copilot Chat
Description:
The Researcher toggle in Copilot Chat featureÂ has been cancelled, as Researcher will be part of the Tools control feature. For users with a Microsoft 365 Copilot license, easily chat with Researcher in Copilot Chat using the new Researcher toggle in the input box.
